name: HKSourceQuery
desc: A query that returns a list of sources, such as apps and devices, that have saved matching queries to the HealthKit store.

items.name: init(sampleType: HKSampleType, samplePredicate: NSPredicate?, completionHandler: (HKSourceQuery, Set<HKSource>?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Instantiates and returns a source query.
